title: ranga bArO pANDuranga
sahitya:
ranga bArO pANDuranga bArO shrI


anupallavi

  ranga bArO narasinga bArO


caraNam 1    kanda bArO enna tande bArO indirA ramaNa mukunda bArO
    caraNam 2    appa bArO timmappa bArO kandarpanayyana kanci varada bArO
    caraNam 3    aNNa bArO enna cinna bArO puNyamUrti mahiSapura cenna bArO
    caraNam 4    viSNu bArO uDupi krSNa bArO enniSTa mUrti purandara viTTala bArO
